author: Bao Dau
content:
College is fucking hell. Don’t you even try to deny it.

It’s a place where you push yourself to the limits and try not to fuck up right before you fuck it all up. It’s not a magical place, it’s where reality stares right into your face. You know it when you are failing, you know it when everything doesn’t work out and you know it when you are getting burned out. It’s a long journey of constantly learning and adapting and whatnot, not failing. It’s so easy to make the wrong choice, be in the wrong place, and spend time with people who don’t matter. There I said it, I said it.
title: It's a fucking disastah
